title: Marine Day
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Woohoo~, we’re swimming, we’re swimming!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I haven’t gone swimming like this in a looong time. But I thought there would be something special for you to ask me to come this early, You.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>But it’s Marine Day today. We’re gonna swim to our hearts’ content~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Is that why you asked me specifically to come?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yup! Just as planned!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Oh, come on, You......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Thanks for making my innocent childhood dream come true, Kanan-chan. ♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>It’s nothing at all. You’re my innocent childhood friend, after all. While I’m at it, how about I go make shaved ice for my innocent childhood friend?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Awesome! Which syrup should I use?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Pour as many kinds as you want. ♪ Since we’re celebrating this special day!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
